itunes:title: This Is the New Testament Week 5 with David Filson
title: This Is the New Testament Week 5 with David Filson
description:
Join Amanda and Raechel for the final week of This Is the New Testament as they sit down with pastor and returning guest, David Filson. Together, they wrap up our summer study of the great narrative of Scripture by walking through the general epistles, along with Revelation. Listen along as they explore the call to holy living, our living hope, and what it looks like to be hope-defenders. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 5 of the She Reads Truth This Is the New Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 


Shop the This Is the New Testament collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 


Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-new-testament-week-5-with-david-filson
